title: Chiropractor in Severna Park, MD | Kennard Chiropractic
description: Welcome to Kennard Chiropractic & Physical Therapy your local chiropractor in Severna Park, MD. Call us today at (410) 994-2350 to schedule an appointment.
cleaned_text: At Kennard Chiropractic & Physical Therapy, we are fully dedicated to providing chiropractic solutions to address your unique needs, whether you are experiencing back pain, neck pain, headaches, or even muscle tightness and tension. Dr. Kennard welcomes you to our practice where we strive to make patients feel at home. This personal care is why people throughout the Severna Park area come to Kennard Chiropractic & Physical Therapy. Our Mission: To provide a personal care facility that enhances your health and improves your quality of life. Our focus is treatment and CARE of your pain and injury without the use of drugs or surgery. Our goal is to heal you and get you back to your activities of daily living as quickly as possible. On your first visit, we will explain the science behind how chiropractic care works, and give you a full evaluation to see if chiropractic and/or physical therapy is appropriate for you. If there is a good fit, we will develop a plan of care that is specific to your condition and health goals. "Observational study found that low back pain patients receiving chiropractic care, which typically includes spinal manipulation, are more satisfied than those receiving medical care." -New England Journal of Medicine Kennard Chiropractic & Physical Therapy of Severna Park Dr. Ross Kennard Severna Park Chiropractor l Kennard & Physical [(410) 421-5544](tel:(410) 421-5544)Fax: (410) 650 Severna Park, MD 21146 Dr. Kennard has been a practicing chiropractor since 2001. He was an associate at one of the largest, multi-doctor Chiropractic and Physical Therapy centers in Maryland for six years. Dr. Kennard is a caring health care provider and a talented chiropractor whose main goal is to get you out of pain and into living a healthy lifestyle so that you will achieve optimal long term health. Dr. Patricia Beall (formerly DeNardo) is originally from upstate New York. She obtained her Bachelors of Science degree from Keuka College. Following graduation, she entered the Chiropractic program at NYCC where she graduated with her Doctor of Chiropractic degree in 2011. Dr. Patti enjoys treating patients from infant to elderly. Her specialty since graduation has grown into a sports focus in particular with runners and triathletes. She is certified in Active Release Technique (ART), Graston technique, Dry Needling and Kinesio Taping. She also holds a passion for treating women pre and postnatal with her certification in the Webster technique. In her spare time you can often find Dr. Patti spending time with her husband and 2 children; or you can catch her at the local running races and triathlons supporting the athletes or cheering on her triathlete husband. She has completed numerous half marathons and 10k's herself. She looks forward to helping keep you active and achieve your wellness goals! Dr. Dominic Sgroi was born and raised in Harford County Maryland. After graduating from Calvert Hall College High School in Towson, Maryland he went on to La Salle University in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania achieving a dream of playing Division 1 baseball, and graduating with a bachelors degree in computer science. Dominic moved back to Maryland after graduation, beginning a career in the Information Technology field. After a handful of years performing IT work Dominic decided it was time for a career change. Beginning in January, 2020 he moved to Spartanburg, South Carolina where he studied at Sherman College of Chiropractic graduating with honors as a Doctor of Chiropractic in June of 2023. In his spare time Dominic enjoys spending time with his fiancé, Taylor. They enjoy going to the beach, exploring different eateries and walking on the trails surrounding the area where they reside. Dominic is an avid Orioles and Ravens fan, but loves all sports. He looks forward to educating and helping the people of The Greater Severna Park Community. 7:00 am - 6:30 pm 7:00 am - 5:00 pm 7:00 am - 6:30 pm 9:00 am - 7:00 pm 7:00 am - 5:00 pm Closed Closed 650 Ritchie Hwy STE 106
